abiDocs.name: lockResolver
abiDocs.details: can only be called from an account that is part of nsadmins
abiDocs.notice: Lock the resolver from any further modifications

abiDocs.name: unlockResolver
abiDocs.details: can only be called from an account that is part of nsadmins
abiDocs.notice: Unlock the resolver to allow further modifications

inputs.name: _key
inputs.description: The bytestring of the contract name

abiDocs.name: registerContract
abiDocs.details: can only be called from an account that is part of nsadmins

inputs.name: _contractaddress
inputs.description: The address of the contract to be registered

abiDocs.name: initRegisterContract
abiDocs.details: Can only be called once per instance.

inputs.name: _key
inputs.description: The bytestring name of the contract to look up
